name: Ready, Set... Date! [NaibEli IDV Fangame]
description:
╔═══━━━─── • ───━━━═══╗

"Surveyor has finally got a date with his beloved detective Mr.Inference! But Mr.Inference doesn't know he's Surveyor, he thinks he has a date with someone named "Recluse". Don't let him discover Surveyor's true identity or he will get in trouble!

Help him dress up before the time runs out!"

╚═══━━━─── • ───━━━═══╝

Our second project made between @Michabun_ (programmer) and @Kab0o_ (writer, illustrator). Special thanks to @Xinanart for the english translation! You can find us all on Twitter.

Once again, criticism is welcomed to help us improve for future projects! We hope this way we can contribute to the community. ^^

* This is a fangame about Naib Subedar, Mercenary, and Eli Clark, Seer, both belonging to the asymmetrical horror game Identity V, developed by NetEase Games. It is a game made by fans and for fans without profit. All rights to the characters do not belong to us.

Nuestro segundo proyecto hecho por @Michabun_ (programadora) y @Kab0o_ (escritora, ilustradora). Agradecimientos especiales a @Xinanart por la traducción al inglés! Puedes encontrarnos en Twitter.

Una vez más, las críticas son bienvenidas pra ayudarnos a mejorar para futuros proyectos! Esperamos que de esta forma podamos contribuir a la comunidad. ^^ 

*Este es un fangame sobre Naib Subedar, Mercenario, y Eli Clark, Vidente, ambos pertenecientes al juego asimétrico de horror Identity V, desarrollado por NetEase Games. Es un juego hecho por fans y para fans sin ánimo de lucro. Todos los derechos de los personajes no nos pertenecen.

『 Controls 』
  • Move - WASD or  ←↑ ↓→
  • Interact - Z / Espace / Enter
  • Menu - X
  • Run - Shift
『 Tips 』
  • Look around to find items! There might be more than you see first glance.
  • You have a lot of time, so no need to be stressed. However, don't forget it's limited!
  • Interact with Brooke in the hallway to save the file!
『 Credits 』

The songs that we have used for this game do not belong to us, below are the songs and their respective owners:

  • Crisis of my Home - Spy x Family Soundtrack
  • Bondmand - Spy x Family Soundtrack
  • Liar - Spy x Family Soundtrack
  • WISE - Spy x Family Soundtrack
  • No one knows - Spy x Family Soundtrack
  • The Big Bad Wolf - Bad Guys 
  • Going to go Good - Bad Guys 
  • On the Banks of the Arno - Amy Hayashi-Jones, Wayne Jones
  • Puzzle Battle Theme - Professor Layton and the Lost Future [Remaster]
